text.p: Hong Kong Dragon Airlines Limited (Dragonair) has succesfully launched its own web site on the Internet, an airline spokeswoman told Reuters.
But she said the airline has no firm plans yet to allow bookings and ticket purchases.
Dragonair's website address at: http://www.dragonair.com includes airline information such as cargo services, destinations and flight schedules.

China National Aviation Corp holds about 36 percent of Dragonair, while Swire Pacific and Cathay Pacific Ltd together hold about 26 percent. --Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44-171-542-7706 Fax+ 44-171-542-5017
